guiSET.core

Class ListView

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.Container
        • guiSET.core.VFlowContainer
          • guiSET.core.VScrollContainer
            • guiSET.core.ListView

  • public class ListView
extends VScrollContainer
    The list view allows to display easily a lot of items in a vertical list. When adding a String a new ListItem will be created and added. You can add items that inherit from Control other than ListItems but they cannot receive the itemSelected() event.
    Author:
    E-Bow

      • deselect

        public void deselect(int index)
        Deselect an item.
        Parameters:
        index - index of item to deselect. Throws no error if index is bad.

      • deselect

        public void deselect(Control item)
        Deselect an item.
        Parameters:
        item - item to deselect.

      • deselectAll

        public void deselectAll()
        Deselect all items

      • select

        public void select(int index)
        Select item with given index. If multiselect is not activated then this will deselect all other selected items. Throws no error if index is bad.
        Parameters:
        index - index in listviews item list

      • select

        public void select(Control item)
        Select item by reference. If multiselect is not activated then this will deselect all other selected items.
        Parameters:
        item - item to select

      • setSelectedItem

        public void setSelectedItem(int index)
        Set one item to be selected programatically. Also deselecting all previously selected items.
        Parameters:
        index - index in listviews item list

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String... newItems)
        Simple adding method just giving the text as String will create automatically new ListItems.
        Parameters:
        newItems - arbitrary number of item texts

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String newItem)
        Simple adding method just giving the text as String will create automatically new ListItems - one-item-version.
        Parameters:
        newItems - item text

      • public class ListView
extends VScrollContainer
        The list view allows to display easily a lot of items in a vertical list. When adding a String a new ListItem will be created and added. You can add items that inherit from Control other than ListItems but they cannot receive the itemSelected() event.
